mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.officeid AS "office.id", so.name AS "office.name", a.couresid AS "courseInfo.id", ci.name AS "courseInfo.name", ci.cover AS "courseInfo.cover", ci.title_type AS "courseInfo.titleType", ci.level AS "courseInfo.level", ci.state AS "courseInfo.state"
left join sys_office so on so.id=a.officeid left join course_info ci on ci.id=a.couresid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_coures_office( id, officeid, couresid, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{officeid}, #{couresid}, #{state} )
